title:
Estimation of correlation coefficients and spin angular distributions of
  fission fragments
authors:
D.E. Lyubashevsky, A.A. Pisklyukov, S.V. Klyuchnikov and P.V.
  Kostryukov
abstract:
This study proposes a theoretical model for studying the spin characteristics
and angular correlations of fission fragments of heavy nuclei. The mechanisms
of spin formation, including the influence of transverse vibrations, are
considered and the relationship between the anisotropy of the angular
distribution and the correlation coefficient is revealed. The theoretical
predictions are compared with experimental data and various models developed by
other research groups.
